text: @realDonaldTrump So should I check in at 7:15pm? Will it actually contain real news, fact based or just more useless sarcasm? Never mind,  I'll just skip it. I'm tired of all the fake news surrounding your phoney briefs. These are supposed to be Covid19 updates and you somehow turn into rally💩
